BSTAN PA GANG LA BDAG ,BDAG GI SKYE BA DENG 'BRAS BCAS, ,DE SKAD
CES SMRAS NAS MU SU LUN DHA W'A RA n'A SI NAS


@478A *, ,'PHAGS NAS LHA'I TSOGS DANG BCAS PA RNAMS NAM MKHA'I
DKYIL DU 'PHAGS TE, DE RNAMS GANG NA 'THAB BRAL BA RNAMS KYI SA
RNAMS YOD PA DER LHA DE

THAMS CAD NYID RAB TU ZHUGS NAS DE RNAMS DE RE ZHIG GI TSE DGA'
MGUR GYUR PAS KYANG KUN TU SPYOD DE, JI SRID DU DE DAG RNAMS SKYE
BA GCIG GI DBANG DU BYAS PA'I TSE MA ZAD

KYI BAR DU'O, ,DE ZAD NAS PHYIS KYANG GANG GIS SDIG PA'I SGO
RNAMS BCAD PA'I MI RNAMS SU DE SKYE'O, ,SKYES NAS KYANG MCHOG TU
GZHON SHA CHAGS PA DANG, GZUGS DANG, LANG

TSO PHUL DU PHYIN PA DANG, 'BYOR CING YANG YUL LJONGS LA DBANG
BAR 'GYUR RO, ,GANG DAG RGYUN DU ZHUGS PA MA YIN PA DE DAG RNAMS
NI TSE 'PHOS NAS JI LTAR CHOS RNAMS KYIS

NYE BAR 'GRO BAR 'GYUR BA DMYAL BA DANG, YI DVAGS DANG, DUD 'GRO
RNAMS SU SKYE'O, ,DE DAG RNAMS NAS 'PHOS NAS GAL TE YANG MI RNAMS
DANG SKAL BA MTSUNGS PA MIR

SKYES NA YANG DE RNAMS DE BZHIN DU GZHON SHA CAN DU 'GYUR ZHING
RGYAN DANG CHA LUGS LA MCHOG TU DGA' BAR YANG 'GYUR TE, DE'I RGYU
MTHUN PA'I LAS RNAMS KYIS SO,, ,,
